parameters.jsCode:
const body = $input.first().json.body || $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { api_key: (body.api_key||'').trim(), action: body.action||'', data: body.data||{} } }];

parameters.responseBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ success: true, action: 'create_category', result: $('Insert Category').first().json[0] }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ success: false, message: 'Unknown action: ' + $(\'Extract Request\').first().json.action + '. Allowed: create_user, create_category, grant_permission, list_users, get_audit_logs' }) }}
={{ JSON.stringify({ success: false, message: $('Check Admin Role').first().json.error || 'Admin role required' }) }}
